metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3783 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: SQL injection vulnerability in admin/categories.php in Dotclear before 2.6.3 allows remote authenticated users with the manage categories permission to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the categories_order parameter.

criterions.comment: dotclear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
